channel.title: Projects on Mathematical Michael
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Mathematical Michael

item.title: Calendar
item.description: A polygon is made with the number of sides corresponding to the year. The number of distinct distances between the vertices of this shape and the origin are determined by the day. The month influences the open-ness of the shape. In some instances, it appears to function like an aperature. Hang Tight. This project will be live very soon. Taking requests for special dates to host on this page as examples.

item.title: Daily Ye
item.description: This project is a work in progress. Mostly I am in need of help sorting through lyrics and removing contributions from collaborators, which Mr. West has many of.

item.title: Moving Pictures
item.description: Please watch this space in the coming weeks. I am reviving an old project that I have presented at a few conferences as an undergraduate. This work kickstarted (well, more like it really developed) my deep love for coding. I am now transcribing work into Python to get away from the limitations of Matlab’s licensing structure. It is a lengthy process. Please be patient.

item.title: Random Art Baby
item.description: This once existed as a twitter bot. It will exist again shortly in another manifestation on this website soon. Please contact me if you would like to participate and have your own piece of art live on this website, updating every day.

item.title: Random || Not Random
item.description: More description to come soon. I am reviving an old project that I have presented at a few conferences as an undergraduate. I won a cash prize for a talk I gave demonstrating an early version of this which involved my first graphical user interface. I am now transcribing work into Python to get away from the limitations of Matlab’s licensing structure. It is a lengthy process. Please be patient.

item.title: Trump in Wonderland
item.description: Thousands of lines of Trump stump speeches mixed with the entirety of Lewis Carol’s Alice in Wonderland. More weight is given to Trump’s speeches. If you have more you would like me to include, please feel free to contact me. Soon I will post a more complete story here and link to examples.

item.title: A New Game of Poker
item.description: This was a really fun project I undertook for a Math Club game night in 2016 with my friend Elliott Regan. current min max Start New Game var canvas = document.getElementById('plotCanvas'); var ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); var num, maxnum, minnum; var interval = 5; var B = [0] var brakes = 200; var ht = canvas.height; var n = canvas.width; var alpha = 5; initPlot(); drawWalk(); function reset() { B = [0]; var id = window.
